name: .SXT File Extension
summary: Learn about .SXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by NN-XT, an advanced audio and instrument sampler used for sound design and instrument emulation; saves a "patch," which includes fine-tuned audio settings that tailor the audio to provide a particular sound output.

content: SXT files can be used for emulating a variety of instruments, such as orchestra instruments, as well as creating custom sounds.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
